channel.title: About on Selim Kuzucu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am an intern research scientist at Five AI (Bosch) Oxford Applied Research Center supervised by Dr. Kemal Oksuz and Dr. Puneet K. Dokania Previously, I obtained by BS in Computer Engineering from Middle East Technical University where I was advised by Prof. Dr. Sinan Kalkan and also was intern at. I am broadly interested in visual percetion with a further focus on robustness, uncertainty and fairness. Education Middle East Technical University Bachelor of Science - Computer Engineering
